section.title: Validating Resolver Basic Troubleshooting
section.para: This section provides basic troubleshooting tips for validating resolver.

section.title: BIND DNSSEC Debug Logging
section.para: Sometimes it may be necessary to enable BIND debug logging to see more details of how DNSSEC is validating (or not). DNSSEC-related messages are not recorded in syslog by default, even if query log is enabled, only DNSSEC errors will show up in syslog. Enabling debug logging is not recommended for production servers, as it increases load on the server.

After restarting BIND, a large number of log messages will appear in syslog.
